page.title: 05WORK
page.content: In our village most of the men work in mines. Policemen are very brave and catch criminals and find things for people. Milkmen have to get up at about 5 o'clock in the morning. At our school the postman comes before we are up. He has a hard job remembering where the different streets are. Dustmen have a very dirty job to do. Some of the things that are thrown away are cleaned and used again. A lot of men in Forest Town work in mines. There are three shifts. My dad is a deputy. When you want to be a deputy you have to go on a training course and learn about First Aid. You have to do a lot of work. Men who work in pits dig out coal. Some men get killed and some men get buried in coal. {DANIEL CHAMBERS, LEE RHOADES
